title: Rightwards Hand Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Point Right Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A hand pointing to the right, with a medium-light skin tone. Used to indicate direction, draw attention, or signify agreement.
apple_vendor_description: The rightwards-pointing hand emoji, in a medium-light skin tone, is a testament to Apple's refined design on its devices, appearing with a subtle dimensionality and polished surface. Realistic lighting casts soft shadows, giving the hand a natural, tactile quality as it gestures forward. Its clean lines and smooth curves make it an ideal visual cue for indicating direction, progress, or moving onward.
